column1: 東京都統計年鑑（平成27年）TOKYO STATISTICAL YEARBOOK ( 2015 )　17  教育・文化・スポーツ 17  EDUCATION， CULTURE， AND SPORTS
17-9  国公立図書館 (1) 設立及び地域別施設状況 (平成27年度末) 17-9  NATIONAL AND PUBLIC LIBRARIES (1) STATUS OF FACILITIES BY ESTABLISHMENT AND DISTRICT ( End of Fiscal Year 2015 )
注 1) 国立国会図書館の蔵書，館外貸出図書冊数には関西館の数を含む。
2) 国立国会図書館東京本館の蔵書数は国会分館の蔵書数を含む。
3) 国立国会図書館の蔵書数と各施設の蔵書数の合計については一致しない。
4) 都立及び区市町村立の館外貸出図書数は個人への貸出のみ。
Note: 1) The numbers of books stocked and loaned at the Kansai-kan are included in figures for the National Diet Library.
2) The number of books stocked at the Detached Library in the Diet is included in figures for the Tokyo Main Library of the National Diet Library.
3) The number of books stocked at the National Diet Library does not match the combined total of books at the National Diet Library facilities.
4) The numbers of books loaned at metropolitan and municipal libraries are for loans to individuals only.
資料：国立国会図書館，都立中央図書館 Source: National Diet Library， Tokyo Metropolitan Central Library
